author: jstrachan
msg: Added Vinay's <thread> tag which supports evaluating a block of Jelly script asynchronously in another thread.

author: werken
msg: Removing debug muck.  Attempting to rectify patternset muck.  (failed).

author: werken
msg: Partial migration of all ant datatypes to OtherAntTag.

author: jstrachan
msg: Added support for dynamic jelly beans. These are similar to <taskdef> in Ant
but in this case any Java Bean can be bound to a Jelly tag then any 'invoke' method can be called.
So for example any Runnable object can be dynamically bound into a dynamic tag library and invoked as a tag.
The method could be run(), invoke(), execute() or whatever.
The Jexl and tag attributes can set all the properties of the bean.
So dynamic tag libraries can now be defined using regular beans or via jelly script.
One more dynamic tag that uses a static method might be interesting to do...

author: jstrachan
msg: allowed setAttribute() to throw an exception so that DynaTag errors can popup to the TagScript for better error reporting
